resources.string: Welcome to the FootLoose.\nYour very own shoe store

Footloose.com is all about footwear. We have been in the shoe business for over 130 years. Yes, you read that correctly, over a century plus a quarter.\nToday we are proud to offer our best customer service to patrons both online here at Footloose.com. For more information about the 130+ history of Stout\'s Footwear, visit our history page.

1. View the list of available shoes in scrollable list
 2. Click on the "+" button on bottom right of the screen to add a new shoe.
 3. on details page, you can enter the shoe details like:
 			a. Shoe name 
			b. Brand 
			c. Shoe size 
			d. Description
 4. Click on save button to save the details.
 5. Click on cancel button to discard and go back to previous screen.
